Queries.Template:
{% assign roleText = "%" | append: role | append: "%" %}

select DocumentId
    from ContentPermissionsPartIndex 
    where ContentType = @contentType and Published = true and (not Enabled or Roles like '{{ roleText }}')
	order by PublishedUtc desc
Queries.Name: RecentActivitiesSQL

Queries.Template:
select ContentType
	from TaxonomyIndex 
	where ContentField = @type and TermContentItemId = @id
Queries.Name: TaxonomyEntityCountSQL

Queries.Template: select DocumentId from ContentItemIndex where DisplayText = @type and latest = true;
Queries.Name: AllTaxonomiesSQL

Queries.Template:
select TermContentItemId, count(TermContentItemId) as popularity 
  	from TaxonomyIndex 
  	where ContentField = @type 
  	group by TermContentItemId 
  	order by popularity desc
Queries.Name: TaxonomyTrendingUpSQL

Queries.Template:
select TermContentItemId, count(TermContentItemId) as popularity 
  	from TaxonomyIndex 
  	where ContentField = @type 
  	group by TermContentItemId 
  	order by popularity asc
Queries.Name: TaxonomyTrendingDownSQL

Queries.Template:
select DocumentId
	from TaxonomyIndex 
	where ContentField = @type and TermContentItemId = @id
Queries.Name: TaxonomyEntitiesSQL

Queries.Template: select ContentItemId from RadarFormPartIndex where DisplayText = @type;
Queries.Name: FormQuerySQL

Queries.Template: select DocumentId from ContentItemIndex where ContentType = @type and DisplayText = @name and Published = true;
Queries.Name: EntityByTypeAndNameSQL

Queries.Template: select UserId from UserIndex where UserId = @userId;
Queries.Name: UserByIdSQL

Queries.Template: select ContentItemId from LocalizedContentItemIndex where LocalizationSet = @localizationSet;
Queries.Name: EntityByLocalizationSetSQL
